block.p: Robin Anne Conway, a daughter of Judith A. Pariseau of Atlanta and Stephen M. Conway of Grand Rapids, Mich., was married yesterday to Michael Christopher Poulos, a son of Betty and Chris T. Poulos of Southington, Conn. The Rev. Camillo Avitabile, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bridegroom, officiated at the Vassar College Chapel in Poughkeepsie, N.Y.

Robin Anne Conway, a daughter of Judith A. Pariseau of Atlanta and Stephen M. Conway of Grand Rapids, Mich., was married yesterday to Michael Christopher Poulos, a son of Betty and Chris T. Poulos of Southington, Conn. The Rev. Camillo Avitabile, a Roman Catholic priest and a cousin of the bridegroom, officiated at the Vassar College Chapel in Poughkeepsie, N.Y.

Mrs. Poulos, 25, and Mr. Poulos, 29, work at Oliver, Wyman & Company, a management consulting firm in New York that serves the financial services industry. She is a consultant; he is a director in the firm's e-commerce practice. The bride graduated from Vassar. The bridegroom graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania.
